Class ApplicantEnquiryController

Object
ApplicantEnquiryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnquiryController
public class ApplicantEnquiryController extends Object implements IEnquiryController
Controller for handling enquiry operations for Applicants

      public Enquiry submitEnquiry(String projectName, String question)
      Submits a new enquiry
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      question - The enquiry question
      Returns:
      The created enquiry, or null if failed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid

      Specified by:

      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      Returns:

      IllegalArgumentException - if enquiryId is invalid

    • updateEnquiry

      public boolean updateEnquiry(String enquiryId, String newQuestion)
      Updates an enquiry's question
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      newQuestion - The new question
      Returns:
      true if updated successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid
